Caption: Figure 6: The initial surface (left) and three views of resulting surface for the bunny data.
Mention:
Finally, the proposed method was tested on a point
set without cameras. Part of the bunny data from
http://www-graphics.stanford.edu/data/
was used. Fictive camera centers were added in the direc-
tion of least variance to give a partition for the initialization.
The initial surface together with the resulting surface are
shown in Figure 6.
